comments.creator: cdleary@acm.org
comments.text:
See bug 634654 comment 23. With the cache added, the difference in time is due to recompilation of the regexp privates. It looks like this is because we purge the regexp objects during the ~6 GCs that occur during v8-regexp.

I plan to do more science on this right away, but I wanted to get the RegExpPrivate cache in for FF10 (on top of the lazy RegExpPrivates) to fix the v8-regexp regression.
comments.author: cdleary@acm.org
